alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 12:49PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches for elevations below 4000 feet, 6 to 12 inches for elevations above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Pierce, Elk River, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, and Dixie * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
